title: Supreme Court in late 19th centuries - trend

content.prompt: The decisions of the Supreme Court in the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries generally did which of the following?

choices.label: Strengthened the regulatory powers of the federal government.
Protected the civil and political rights of African Americans.
Protected the civil and political rights of women.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
